page.title: 18THE LOCAL INDUSTRIES
page.content: DESPITE BEING A LARGELY RURAL AREA, WITH A GREATER RELIANCE ON AGRICULTURE THAN ANYTHING ELSE, THERE ARE A FEW INDUSTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH THE PRESENCE OF LARGE WOODLAND TRACTS. IN HORSFORD, THERE IS A{TOOL SUPPLY COMPANY,{TOOL MAINTENANCE}COMPANIES IN HORSFORD AND FELTHORPE AND A SMALL NUMBER OF TIMBER YARDS SPREAD BETWEEN BOTH VILLAGES.THEY ARE SUPPLIED WITH, AND CUT, LOCAL TIMBER. AMONGST THE LOCAL POPULATION ARE A NUMBER OF FOLK WHO RUN{SMALL FAMILY BUSINESSES,}OFTEN TO DO WITH THE{BUILDING CONSTRUCTION TRADE OR DOUBLE GLAZING.ALSO THERE ARE {TWO MANUFACTURING COMPANIES}IN DOG LANE, ONE MAKING BUILDING BLOCKS, THE OTHER REPLACEMENT WINDOWS. THERE ARE A FEW{SERVICE INDUSTRIES}SUCH AS GARAGES AND SMALL SHOPS BUT MANY PEOPLE PREFER THOSE IN NORWICH WHICH OFFER GREATER CHOICE, SPECIALISM, OR ECONOMY.
